RNNencdec.from sentence: In , we see that the performance of RNNencdec dramatically drops as the length of the sentences increases .

more robust.from sentence: On the other hand , both RNNsearch - 30 and RNNsearch - 50 are more robust to the length of the sentences .

no performance deterioration.from sentence: RNNsearch - 50 , especially , shows no performance deterioration even with sentences of length 50 or more .

outperforms.from sentence: This superiority of the proposed model over the basic encoder - decoder is further confirmed by the fact that the RNNsearch - 30 even outperforms RNNencdec - 50 ( see ) .
